text: Tamilichikagani m’majumba mwenu, soni ngasinnosyaga yakulisalalisya yenu yayatiji pakulosyedwa ndema ja ujinga jandanda, ni n’jimicheje Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka, ni mumpikanileje Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe r. Chisimu Allah akusaka kuti antyochesye usakwa (wasambi), E jenumanja achinsyene nyumba (ja Ntume ﷺ), ni answejesye kunswejesya kusyesyene
